setup() - Method in class com.github.moribund.audio.MusicPlayer
Sets up the MusicPlayer.musicForFile looping through every MusicFile value and using its MusicFile.location field and LibGDX's Audio class to make a new Music instance.
setup() - Method in class com.github.moribund.images.SpriteDrawer
Populates the SpriteDrawer.spriteForFile, using SpriteDrawer.makeSprite(SpriteFile) to make Sprites.

SpriteScope - Annotation Type in com.github.moribund.images
The singleton SpriteScope that allows for memory saving and practicality of the SpriteComponent by keeping one instance of the respective SpriteModules.
